response: Welcome to Ola's service subscription offerings. We provide two tiers of subscription plans, Ola Care and Ola Care Plus, offering benefits like roadside assistance, free labor service, theft assistance, and free replacement of consumables. We also offer extended warranty plans for your Ola S1 and S1 Pro, covering up to 5 years or 60,000 km, whichever is earlier. Enhance your Ola experience with our accessories like center stand, buddy step, and scooter cover. Join the Ola revolution with our graphic printed T-shirts. Purchase these directly from our website or app. Enjoy peace of mind and convenience with Ola.
